synopsis.text:
One day, Miho Shinohara, an ordinary 9-year-old with dreams of fame and a knack for drawing, stumbles upon two enchanted dinosaurs disguised as dolls. These magical creatures, Pigu and Megu, bestow upon her a remarkable gift: a mystical drawing pad that brings her fashion designs to life and the ability to transform into a captivating teenager.

Adopting the stage name Lala, Miho's life takes a thrilling turn when she is scouted by a prominent talent agency. As she embarks on her journey into the world of showbiz as a model, actress, and pop star, Miho discovers that the path to stardom is filled with challenges.

Balancing her double life as a schoolgirl and a rising celebrity, she must navigate the ups and downs of the entertainment industry. With her magical abilities and newfound fame, can Miho make her dreams come true while maintaining her true identity as a young girl with big aspirations? Join her on this enchanting adventure and find out!
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
